de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.models
Class ScriptModel

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<CommandModel>
              de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.models.CommandModel
                  de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.models.ScriptModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<CommandModel>, java.util.Collection<CommandModel>, java.util.List<CommandModel>, java.util.RandomAccess, javax.swing.tree.TreeModel
public class ScriptModel
extends CommandModel
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeModel

This class is the "root" CommandModel that represents a complete script. In contrast to a normal CommandModel it has some extra functionality and implements a TreeModel. So if you want to have an outline of the script you can simply use this object as a model for a JTree

See Also:
